articles.author: by  Wasilat Azeez
articles.title: Partnership with Microsoft will help preserve local languages, says FG - TheCable
articles.description: The federal government says it engaged Microsoft, an American multinational technology company, to help use machine learning and artificial intelligence in preserving local languages.
articles.content:
The federal government says it engaged Microsoft, an American multinational technology company, to help use machine learning and artificial intelligence in preserving local languages.
